content: Combat sport events in 2022 ***ONE 161: Petchmorakot vs. Tawanchai*** was a [Combat sport](/wiki/Combat_sport) event produced by [ONE Championship](/wiki/ONE_Championship) that took place on September 29, 2022 at the [Singapore Indoor Stadium](/wiki/Singapore_Indoor_Stadium) in [Kallang](/wiki/Kallang), Singapore. ## Background The event was originally expected to be headlined by a [ONE Heavyweight World Championship](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_champions#Heavyweight_World_Championship) title unification bout between current champion [Arjan Bhullar](/wiki/Arjan_Bhullar) and interim champion [Anatoly Malykhin](/wiki/Anatoly_Malykhin). However, Bhullar withdraw due to suffering an injury in training, It was announced that Bhullar had surgery on the arm two weeks ago and the bout was cancelled. A [ONE Featherweight Muay Thai World Championship](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_champions#Featherweight_World_Championship_3) bout between current champion [Petchmorakot Petchyindee](/wiki/Petchmorakot_Petchyindee_Academy) and #1 ranked contender [Tawanchai P.K.Saenchai](/wiki/Tawanchai_P.K._Saenchaimuaythaigym) was expected to the co-main event. They were elevated to main event status in August after the cancellation of the original headliner. This event has announced [ONE Heavyweight Kickboxing World Grand Prix Tournament](/wiki/2022_in_ONE_Championship#ONE_Kickboxing_Heavyweight_Grand_Prix_bracket), There are four-man fighters in the tournament featured current [ONE Light Heavyweight Kickboxing World Champion](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_champions#Light_Heavyweight_Kickboxing_World_Championship) [Roman Kryklia](/wiki/Roman_Kryklia), former UFC veteran [Guto Inocente](/wiki/Guto_Inocente), [Iraj Azizpour](/wiki/Iraj_Azizpour) and Bruno Chaves that took place in the semifinal tournament. A flyweight bout between former [ONE Flyweight Championship](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_champions#Flyweight_World_Championship) challenger [Yuya Wakamatsu](/wiki/Yuya_Wakamatsu) and Xie Wei was scheduled for the event. However, Xie was removed from the bout for undisclosed reasons and replaced by Wang Shuo. At the weigh-ins, [Han Zihao](/wiki/Han_Zihao) weighed in at 153.75 lb, 8.75 lb over the bantamweight non-title fight limit of 145 pounds. the bout agreed to moved to the featherweight division (145–155 lbs) where Han was fined 30%, which went to [Ferrari Fairtex](/wiki/Ferrari_Fairtex). Wang Shuo came in at 139.5 pounds, 3.5 pounds over the flyweight non-title limit. The bout was later scrapped after Wang Shuo pulled out of the bout. ## Results Main card (YouTube / Watch ONE)Weight classMethodRoundTimeNotesFeatherweight Muay Thai[Tawanchai P.K.Saenchai](/wiki/Tawanchai_P.K._Saenchaimuaythaigym)def.[Petchmorakot Petchyindee](/wiki/Petchmorakot_Petchyindee_Academy) (c)Decision (unanimous) (49–47, 50–45, 49–46)53:00[a]Heavyweight Kickboxing[Roman Kryklia](/wiki/Roman_Kryklia)def.[Guto Inocente](/wiki/Guto_Inocente)TKO (head kick)10:52[b]Heavyweight Kickboxing[Iraj Azizpour](/wiki/Iraj_Azizpour)def.Bruno ChavesDecision (unanimous)33:00[c]LightweightSaygid Izagakhmaevdef.[Zhang Lipeng](/wiki/Zhang_Lipeng)Decision (unanimous)35:00Women's AtomweightTiffany Teodef.[Ritu Phogat](/wiki/Ritu_Phogat)Submission (rear-naked choke)14:52Heavyweight[Oumar Kane](/wiki/Oumar_Kane)def.Batradz GazzaevTKO (punches)22:15Lead card (YouTube / Watch ONE)Bantamweight Muay Thai[Alaverdi Ramazanov](/wiki/Alaverdi_Ramazanov)def.[Capitan Petchyindee](/wiki/Capitan_Petchyindee_Academy)Decision (split)33:00Bantamweight Muay Thai[Sangmanee P.K.Saenchai](/wiki/Sangmanee_Sor_Tienpo)def.Zhang ChenglongDecision (split)33:00Featherweight Muay Thai[Ferrari Fairtex](/wiki/Ferrari_Fairtex)def.[Han Zihao](/wiki/Han_Zihao)Decision (unanimous)33:00[d]Bantamweight Submission GrapplingRodrigo Marellodef.Ruslan BagdasarianSubmission (ankle lock)10:15MiddleweightAli Foladidef.Matheus FelipeKO (punch)14:20 ## Bonus awards The following fighters received $50,000 bonuses. - **Performance of the Night: Roman Kryklia, Tiffany Teo** and **Rodrigo Marello** - Martial Arts portal - [2022 in ONE Championship](/wiki/2022_in_ONE_Championship) - [List of ONE Championship events](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_events) - [List of current ONE fighters](/wiki/List_of_current_ONE_fighters)
